Title: Requires each violator of "Buster's Law" to register his or her name and address with the division of criminal justice services
Summary: Requires each violator of "Buster's Law" to register his or her name and address with the division of criminal justice services.
LawCode: Add ยง352, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a public registry for persons convicted of violating "Buster's Law"
